Dear {{ publisher_name }},

The update request which you submitted for "{{ journal_title }}" has been rejected. This is either because:

- we were unable to verify the information which you provided with the information stated on your website. Please double check your website and submit a new update request when you are ready; or
- we already have one active update in the system. Additional update requests are rejected without review.

If you have any questions about this or require further details, please email feedback@doaj.org.

Yours faithfully,

The DOAJ Editorial Team

**This is an automated message. Please do not reply to this message.**
